name: 利亚姆·坎波拉
name_full: 利亚姆·坎波拉 Liam Campora
introduction: LIAM CAMPORA is a film and theatre actor/singer/dancer. He is best known for portraying Enzo in CABRINI (2024) directed by Alejandro Monteverde. He is also recognized for his role in MARVIN'S ROOM (Charlie) on Broadway, The Disney international tour for BEAUTY AND THE BEAST (Chip) and NOURA (Yazen) at Playwrights Horizons. Liam is also a versatile dancer with scholarships at THE AILEY SCHOOL, SCHOOL OF AMERICAN BALLET SI and THE ELLISON BALLET SI. He is fluent in French and Italian. @marlonliamcampora
